text: Southern rock is a kind of rock music from the southern part of the United States. Some southern rock music groups include: Lynyrd Skynyrd, The Allman Brothers Band and Molly Hatchet. ==Notable Artist== *The Allman Brothers Band *Lynyrd Skynyrd *Atlanta Rhythm Section *Wet Willy *Molly Hatchet *Outlaws *Blackfoot *Black Oak Arkansas Category:Rock music
title: Southern rock
